text: I keep seeing fish printing videos on PikPok
Wouldn't it be great if the wall was filled with fish?
Woah! The wall looks so complete now!
Nice photo I put up right? I'll take you boating one day
What are you doing here young one?
How lovely. As you can see - I'm guarding this door
Will you let me go through?
Oh. I suppose so!    But I can't let you through so simply
Draw me 2 flowers and I'll let you through
Keep it a secret for me
I don't actually need drawings of flowers...
Can you draw them for me anyway?
That's at least 2 flowers for you!
Well done. Go on through now!
Draw for me... The landmarks of the island!!!
If you're lost there are signs!!!
Here's a SECRET!!! Draw the letter A!!!
Do you have a snack perhaps?
I'm not suppposed to do this...
But as a reward I'll let you through!
Keep it a secret for me...
I can let anyone through the gate...
Sorry there's not much else here
I heard someone is building a hotel here soon
Then the island will be bustling again
Shaki Shaki Island will always be here for you to visit again
Go on your way now child
